tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Pregnancy Check Up,
review: I recommend this doctor because I had major issues in my pregnancy due to that I had gone through the LSCS surgery done by dr.lalitha madam .she  friendly treated me and gave me positive vibes to a good birth. From starting of my pregnancy to my labour she treated me and I middle of my pregnancy i faced a lot problems and came back because of her .I was admitted in aster hospital for my low platelet count and had breathing issues due to dengue positive and she personally visited me to check health condition and she was collecting my day to day health condition from the aster doctors. That is what I liked in her and it is called a good soul doctor who doesn't prefer money instead she looks after a person's life .i finally thank this doctor who made me mother and gave my baby safely to me ..üôèüôè

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: she is good doctor and she is our family doctor****** *** ********* ** **** *******.i will prefer the pt to this doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is a doctor. one advice from my side is "please write prescription clearly" people use to face issue while purchasing medicine .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I don't recommend this doctor at all. *** *** ******* ********* ** ************* * ***** **** **** ****** ** **** ********** ** **** ** ********* ******* ** **** She did D&C to my wife, ***** ***** *** *** ******** *** *** ******* We kept on asking her about this situation and she said every thing is fine. But due to this bleeding she got infected and her tubes got blocked. When we approached other doctors, they said bleeding for 1-2 months are not normal *** ********* *** ******** ****** **** **** ***** ************* *********** ****** *********** *** ****** ****** **** *** ******* **** ***** ********* ********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: ****** ******* ** *** **** *********** ******** ****** ***** ******* ******* ******* *** ******* ***** *** **** *** doesn't even explain what you are going through. My consultation was just for 2 mins. very bad experience

review: Very good **** doctor she tells how to be at times and also caring well ********* **** experience and polite

review: Most efficient, friendly* ************* doctor. Treats very well. Way of communicating with patients is appreciable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** *************.I delivered my baby under her guidance.10/10 for her positive vibes and friendliness which is very important for a doctor.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very nice and good treatment i am full satisfied with my health treatment dr dharmapal orthopedic refer to her so thank you for both of us

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had a good consulting doctor lalitha mam.

Really she explains each and everything in the way we can understand. 

Really she gives a positive confidence in us to complete the medication and brings lot of improvement in us.
Now I am not worried  about my health more .

3 months once I meet mam and consult regarding my health ******* ****** * *** *** ** ******* *
